characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: A model equipped with a bigbomm can drop it as it flies over enemy units in its Movement phase After the model has moved, pick one enemy unit that it flew over.  then, roll a D6 for each model in the enemy unit (up to a Max of 5 dice).  For Each roll of a 5+, the target unit suffers 1 mortal wound.  It can only do this once per battle.
